H0.text: In the name of the mountain K2, for what does the K stand. Kangchenjunga

H1.text: In the name of the mountain K2, for what does the K stand. Kilimanjaro

H2.text: In the name of the mountain K2, for what does the K stand. Kyrgyzstan

H3.text: In the name of the mountain K2, for what does the K stand. Karokoram

A4.text: where the K stands for Karakoram.

A5.text: K2 lies in the northwestern Karakoram Range.

A6.text: Karakoram is a Turkic term meaning black gravel.

A7.text: The Karakoram is the second-highest mountain range on Earth and part of a complex of ranges that includes the Pamir Mountains, Hindu Kush, and the Indian Himalayas.
